verbose_text: To the Editor, We report the cases of 2 patients from Barcelona, Spain, admitted to the emergency department of our hospital secondary to COVID-19 (formerly known as SARS-CoV-2) pneumonia, confirmed with a real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain-reaction test XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR; both patients showed respiratory deterioration and elevated serum D-dimer levels.
